page.title: 16A School Girl's Morning
page.content:
I{(Lucy Deane)}woke up, rubbed my eyes, jumped out of bed and pulled back the curtains. I made my bed and then got dressed into my blue and white checked{school uniform}at 7.30, then I got my face washed and cleaned my hands. { {Breakfast}is down stairs in the kitchen at a large wooden table. I ate Harvest Crunch, a wheat cereal with milk and sugar. After that I usually have toast and butter with some Marmite and an apple.
At 8.25 I run down to the paddock in the garden and feed our{chickens, {sheep and horses.
At 8.30 I jump in the car with my {school books}in my satchel and mummy drives me to school.
